Reviews.Content: couldnt expect comfort posh upper eastside ny low price guy reception friendly hed adjust occuring asap location upper eastside secure clean quiet appartement house wasnt sometimes quiet alike via subway 6 reach destinations quiet easy central park museum mile close equipped ac thank god comfy beds tv food channel rules didnt kitchen equipped internet shared blessing sanitary staff day taking garbage twice week cleaning 1 cockroach dead flat mates nice met corridor dirty towels etc left staff doesnt staying moment left sometimes little accumulation food shampoos former inhabitants bad unpleasant couldnt lock personal appartement doors locked bathroom door course lockable cabinet valuables arrived fresh sheets bed received morning disgusting day toilet didnt flush fixed evening morning didnt warm water announced via notes staircase sometimes receptionist call lunch subway quiet 1520min annoying day walking city bed asap ok extra workout loose calories healthy american food conclusion glad found inexpensive stay despite little recommend appartment house maybe departement building close sooner official hostel hotel notes entrance 2 days left mention absolutely stay flexible appartement fire escape smoke detector fine youre staying

Reviews.Title: “You pay for what you get”
Reviews.Author: e_whittingham
Reviews.Content: price arrived 1130pm originally booked filled lock people common nice didnt computer outside kitchen bathroom pretty clean couldnt considering price single bed climb ladder double bed wasnt sit bed sleeping single bed accomodated people ok walls bare except tv overall stay budget
